info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 08 at 4:02AM MST until January 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Kiowa County, Bent, and Prowers Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
